text: 5.5 Sng 22.5, 25.20, 2 Ko 1.22, Gal 4.6, Epe 1.13-14, Hib 6.18-19 God ne Kawnan ne ak chɨnop agyokek, binɨb kɨlop mapen lep ak, ne anɨb ak gos chɨn nab ayaŋ monmon tɨg sogak. Anɨb ak tek God chɨnop gɨtep gɨnɨgab agɨl gos sek kod mɨdobun ak, chɨn nɨŋɨd anɨgɨl nopun, yokɨp gos sek kod ma mɨdobun. God chɨnop anɨgɨl gɨtep gɨnɨgab.
